TEXT.English: [TAB]In most Luchuirp cities, the sculptor's studio can be found next to the graveyard. Charged with crafting both golems and gravestones, the mason's art perfectly embodies both life and death.[PARAGRAPH:1]It is a well-known fact that the craft of a sculptor is often one of the most profitable professions within Luchuirp society. Many years ago, a young sculptor carved an Iron Golem with the face of Athos Ulthane, the saviour of Ironstone Pass. Since that day many prominent citizens became supporters of the arts in the hope that they might be remembered in a similar fashion.[PARAGRAPH:1]Yet what of the lesser golems, those baked from mud and clay and the detritus of the streets. The silent servants that perform the tasks that no-one else wants to. Who knows what faces adorn these pitiless creatures? Ask all you want. For all the words written in the heads, none will ever emerge from their lips.[PARAGRAPH:1]But if you pay for sufficient drinks and listen carefully to the whispers of the right rotgut beggar in the wrong part of Ithralia, you might learn that the golem which cleans the sewers at the docks bears an uncanny resemblance to Hamish Two-Strings, the infamous murderer and thief.[PARAGRAPH:1]In death, as in life, social hierarchies remain, carved in metal and stone and clay forever.
TEXT.French: [TAB]In most Luchuirp cities, the sculptor's studio can be found next to the graveyard. Charged with crafting both golems and gravestones, the mason's art perfectly embodies both life and death.[PARAGRAPH:1]It is a well-known fact that the craft of a sculptor is often one of the most profitable professions within Luchuirp society. Many years ago, a young sculptor carved an Iron Golem with the face of Athos Ulthane, the saviour of Ironstone Pass. Since that day many prominent citizens became supporters of the arts in the hope that they might be remembered in a similar fashion.[PARAGRAPH:1]Yet what of the lesser golems, those baked from mud and clay and the detritus of the streets. The silent servants that perform the tasks that no-one else wants to. Who knows what faces adorn these pitiless creatures? Ask all you want. For all the words written in the heads, none will ever emerge from their lips.[PARAGRAPH:1]But if you pay for sufficient drinks and listen carefully to the whispers of the right rotgut beggar in the wrong part of Ithralia, you might learn that the golem which cleans the sewers at the docks bears an uncanny resemblance to Hamish Two-Strings, the infamous murderer and thief.[PARAGRAPH:1]In death, as in life, social hierarchies remain, carved in metal and stone and clay forever.
TEXT.German: [TAB]In most Luchuirp cities, the sculptor's studio can be found next to the graveyard. Charged with crafting both golems and gravestones, the mason's art perfectly embodies both life and death.[PARAGRAPH:1]It is a well-known fact that the craft of a sculptor is often one of the most profitable professions within Luchuirp society. Many years ago, a young sculptor carved an Iron Golem with the face of Athos Ulthane, the saviour of Ironstone Pass. Since that day many prominent citizens became supporters of the arts in the hope that they might be remembered in a similar fashion.[PARAGRAPH:1]Yet what of the lesser golems, those baked from mud and clay and the detritus of the streets. The silent servants that perform the tasks that no-one else wants to. Who knows what faces adorn these pitiless creatures? Ask all you want. For all the words written in the heads, none will ever emerge from their lips.[PARAGRAPH:1]But if you pay for sufficient drinks and listen carefully to the whispers of the right rotgut beggar in the wrong part of Ithralia, you might learn that the golem which cleans the sewers at the docks bears an uncanny resemblance to Hamish Two-Strings, the infamous murderer and thief.[PARAGRAPH:1]In death, as in life, social hierarchies remain, carved in metal and stone and clay forever.
TEXT.Italian: [TAB]In most Luchuirp cities, the sculptor's studio can be found next to the graveyard. Charged with crafting both golems and gravestones, the mason's art perfectly embodies both life and death.[PARAGRAPH:1]It is a well-known fact that the craft of a sculptor is often one of the most profitable professions within Luchuirp society. Many years ago, a young sculptor carved an Iron Golem with the face of Athos Ulthane, the saviour of Ironstone Pass. Since that day many prominent citizens became supporters of the arts in the hope that they might be remembered in a similar fashion.[PARAGRAPH:1]Yet what of the lesser golems, those baked from mud and clay and the detritus of the streets. The silent servants that perform the tasks that no-one else wants to. Who knows what faces adorn these pitiless creatures? Ask all you want. For all the words written in the heads, none will ever emerge from their lips.[PARAGRAPH:1]But if you pay for sufficient drinks and listen carefully to the whispers of the right rotgut beggar in the wrong part of Ithralia, you might learn that the golem which cleans the sewers at the docks bears an uncanny resemblance to Hamish Two-Strings, the infamous murderer and thief.[PARAGRAPH:1]In death, as in life, social hierarchies remain, carved in metal and stone and clay forever.
TEXT.Spanish: [TAB]In most Luchuirp cities, the sculptor's studio can be found next to the graveyard. Charged with crafting both golems and gravestones, the mason's art perfectly embodies both life and death.[PARAGRAPH:1]It is a well-known fact that the craft of a sculptor is often one of the most profitable professions within Luchuirp society. Many years ago, a young sculptor carved an Iron Golem with the face of Athos Ulthane, the saviour of Ironstone Pass. Since that day many prominent citizens became supporters of the arts in the hope that they might be remembered in a similar fashion.[PARAGRAPH:1]Yet what of the lesser golems, those baked from mud and clay and the detritus of the streets. The silent servants that perform the tasks that no-one else wants to. Who knows what faces adorn these pitiless creatures? Ask all you want. For all the words written in the heads, none will ever emerge from their lips.[PARAGRAPH:1]But if you pay for sufficient drinks and listen carefully to the whispers of the right rotgut beggar in the wrong part of Ithralia, you might learn that the golem which cleans the sewers at the docks bears an uncanny resemblance to Hamish Two-Strings, the infamous murderer and thief.[PARAGRAPH:1]In death, as in life, social hierarchies remain, carved in metal and stone and clay forever.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]A cove can't be built within 3 tiles of another cove.
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]La Crique Pirate est seulement disponible pour les civilisations qui commencent avec la technologie Navigation (les Lanuns). Cela permet aux ouvriers de créer une crique sur une case de côte (possédée par le joueur ou non possédée) dans laquelle les navires peuvent entrer. Tant qu'ils sont dans la crique, les navires gagnent en défense, augmente le taux de guérison et un champ de vision légèrement meilleur. Si une crique est dans une case possédée par le joueur, elle fournit une petite quantité d'or. Une crique ne peut être construite à moins de trois cases d'une autre crique.
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET] Eine Bucht muss mindestens 3 Geländefelder Abstand zur nächsten haben.
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]A cove can't be built within 3 tiles of another cove.
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]A cove can't be built within 3 tiles of another cove.

TEXT.English: Smoke is an early indication that a tile could burst into [LINK=FEATURE_FLAMES]flames[\LINK].
TEXT.French: La Fumée est une indication préventive qu'une case peut s'incendier.
TEXT.German: Rauch ist ein frühes Zeichen dafür das ein Feld bald in Flammen stehen könnte.
TEXT.Italian: Smoke is an early indication that a tile could burst into [LINK=FEATURE_FLAMES]flames[\LINK].
TEXT.Spanish: El humo es una indicación previa de que una casilla podría incendiarse.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]%D1 to the [LINK=CONCEPT_ARMAGEDDON_COUNTER]Armageddon Counter[\LINK] when a living unit is killed in combat
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]%D1 to the [LINK=CONCEPT_ARMAGEDDON_COUNTER]Armageddon Counter[\LINK] when a living unit is killed in combat
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]%D1 zum [LINK=CONCEPT_ARMAGEDDON_COUNTER]Armageddonzähler[\LINK] Wenn eine lebende Einheit im Kampf getötet wurde.
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]%D1 to the [LINK=CONCEPT_ARMAGEDDON_COUNTER]Armageddon Counter[\LINK] when a living unit is killed in combat
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]%D1 to the [LINK=CONCEPT_ARMAGEDDON_COUNTER]Armageddon Counter[\LINK] when a living unit is killed in combat

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Unit is 20% more likely to resist the [LINK=SPELL_CHARM_PERSON]Charm Person[\LINK] spell.
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Unit is 20% more likely to resist the [LINK=SPELL_CHARM_PERSON]Charm Person[\LINK] spell.
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Es besteht eine Wahrscheinlichkeit von 20%, dass die Einheit dem [LINK=SPELL_CHARM_PERSON]Beeindrucken[\LINK] Zauber widersteht.
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Unit is 20% more likely to resist the [LINK=SPELL_CHARM_PERSON]Charm Person[\LINK] spell.
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Unit is 20% more likely to resist the [LINK=SPELL_CHARM_PERSON]Charm Person[\LINK] spell.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Units killed by a Werewolf become [LINK=UNIT_RAVENOUS_WEREWOLF]Ravenous Werewolves[\LINK] under the werewolf's owner's control.
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Les unités tuées par un Loup-Garou deviennent des [LINK=UNIT_RAVENOUS_WEREWOLF]Loup-Garou Vorace[\LINK] sous le contrôle de propriétaire du Loup-Garou.
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Von einem Werwolf besiegte Einheiten verwandeln sich selbst in [LINK=UNIT_RAVENOUS_WEREWOLF]Lechzende Werwölfe[\LINK] und folgen ihrem Herrn.
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Units killed by a Werewolf become [LINK=UNIT_RAVENOUS_WEREWOLF]Ravenous Werewolves[\LINK] under the werewolf's owner's control.
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Units killed by a Werewolf become [LINK=UNIT_RAVENOUS_WEREWOLF]Ravenous Werewolves[\LINK] under the werewolf's owner's control.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]City gains happiness for a few turns[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Caster gains a few experience[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]50% chance to kill the caster[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Winning [LINK=UNIT_SLAVE]Slave[\LINK] will upgrade to [LINK=UNIT_WARRIOR]Warrior[\LINK]
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]50% de chances de tuer votre unité, mais si elle survit elle obtiendra de l'expérience pour son combat. Dans tous les cas, la ville gagne du bonheur pour quelques tours.
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]50% Chance dass die Einheit stirbt, aber wenn deine Einheit überlebt wid sie aus diesem Kampf Erfahrungen erhalten. So oder so wird die Stadt für einige Runden zufriedener sein
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]50% chance to kill your unit, but if your unit survives he will gain experience from his battle. Either way the city gains happiness for a few turns.
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]50% chance to kill your unit, but if your unit survives he will gain experience from his battle. Either way the city gains happiness for a few turns.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Does 40% death damage to enemy units[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Heals all allied [LINK=PROMOTION_UNDEAD]undead[\LINK] units[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Raises 3 [LINK=UNIT_WRAITH]Wraith[\LINK]s from graveyards[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Range: 2
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Does 40% death damage to enemy units[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Heals all allied [LINK=PROMOTION_UNDEAD]undead[\LINK] units[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Raises 3 [LINK=UNIT_WRAITH]Wraith[\LINK]s from graveyards[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Range: 2
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Fügt feindlichen Einheiten 40% Todes-Schaden hinzu[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Heilt alle verbündeten [LINK=PROMOTION_UNDEAD]untoten[\LINK] Einheiten[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Aus Gräbern entsteigen 3 [LINK=UNIT_WRAITH]Gespenster[\LINK][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Reichweite: 2
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Does 40% death damage to enemy units[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Heals all allied [LINK=PROMOTION_UNDEAD]undead[\LINK] units[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Raises 3 [LINK=UNIT_WRAITH]Wraith[\LINK]s from graveyards[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Range: 2
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Does 40% death damage to enemy units[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Heals all allied [LINK=PROMOTION_UNDEAD]undead[\LINK] units[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Raises 3 [LINK=UNIT_WRAITH]Wraith[\LINK]s from graveyards[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Range: 2

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Does 30% holy damage to all [LINK=PROMOTION_UNDEAD]undead[\LINK] units within 1 tile
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Does 30% holy damage to all [LINK=PROMOTION_UNDEAD]undead[\LINK] units within 1 tile
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]fügt allen [LINK=PROMOTION_UNDEAD]untoten[\LINK] Einheiten 20% Schaden durch Weihung zu, bis zu einem Maximum von 50%[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Reichweite: +1
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Does 30% holy damage to all [LINK=PROMOTION_UNDEAD]undead[\LINK] units within 1 tile
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Does 30% holy damage to all [LINK=PROMOTION_UNDEAD]undead[\LINK] units within 1 tile

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Does Damage to all the worlds [LINK=PROMOTION_DEMON]Demonic[\LINK] and [LINK=PROMOTION_UNDEAD]Undead[\LINK] units
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Does Damage to all the worlds [LINK=PROMOTION_DEMON]Demonic[\LINK] and [LINK=PROMOTION_UNDEAD]Undead[\LINK] units
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Does Damage to all the worlds [LINK=PROMOTION_DEMON]Demonic[\LINK] and [LINK=PROMOTION_UNDEAD]Undead[\LINK] units

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Creates a [LINK=EQUIPMENT_GOLDEN_HAMMER]Golden Hammer[\LINK] in each of your cities
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Crée un [LINK=EQUIPMENT_GOLDEN_HAMMER]Marteau doré[\LINK] dans chacune de vos villes
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Erschafft einen [LINK=EQUIPMENT_GOLDEN_HAMMER]Goldenen Hammer[\LINK] in jeder euerer Städte
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Creates a [LINK=EQUIPMENT_GOLDEN_HAMMER]Golden Hammer[\LINK] in each of your cities
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Creates a [LINK=EQUIPMENT_GOLDEN_HAMMER]Golden Hammer[\LINK] in each of your cities

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Gives living units of at least 6th level the [LINK=PROMOTION_VAMPIRE]Vampire[\LINK] promotion
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Verleiht einer lebenden Einheit die [LINK=PROMOTION_VAMPIRE]Vampirismus[\LINK]-Beförderung, vorausgesetzt sie hat Erfahrungsstufe 6 erreicht.
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Gives living units of at least 6th level the [LINK=PROMOTION_VAMPIRE]Vampire[\LINK] promotion
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Gives living units of at least 6th level the [LINK=PROMOTION_VAMPIRE]Vampire[\LINK] promotion

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Grants living units in the tile the [LINK=PROMOTION_BLESSED]Blessed[\LINK], [LINK=PROMOTION_LOYALTY]Loyalty[\LINK], [LINK=PROMOTION_COURAGE]Courage[\LINK] and [LINK=PROMOTION_VALOR]Valor[\LINK] promotions but will kill them at the end of the turn
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Accorde aux unités vivantes dans la case les promotions [LINK=PROMOTION_BLESSED]Béni[\LINK], [LINK=PROMOTION_LOYALTY]Loyauté[\LINK], [LINK=PROMOTION_COURAGE]Courage[\LINK] et [LINK=PROMOTION_VALOR]Valeur[\LINK] mais les tuera à la fin du tour.
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Verleiht allen lebenden Einheiten auf dem Geländefeld die Beförderungen [LINK=PROMOTION_BLESSED]Gesegnet[\LINK], [LINK=PROMOTION_LOYALTY]Loyalität[\LINK], [LINK=PROMOTION_COURAGE]Tapferkeit[\LINK] und [LINK=PROMOTION_VALOR]Heldenmut[\LINK], aber das wird sie am Ende der Runde töten.
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Grants living units in the tile the [LINK=PROMOTION_BLESSED]Blessed[\LINK], [LINK=PROMOTION_LOYALTY]Loyalty[\LINK], [LINK=PROMOTION_COURAGE]Courage[\LINK] and [LINK=PROMOTION_VALOR]Valor[\LINK] promotions but will kill them at the end of the turn
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Grants living units in the tile the [LINK=PROMOTION_BLESSED]Blessed[\LINK], [LINK=PROMOTION_LOYALTY]Loyalty[\LINK], [LINK=PROMOTION_COURAGE]Courage[\LINK] and [LINK=PROMOTION_VALOR]Valor[\LINK] promotions but will kill them at the end of the turn

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Transforms all the forests in your empire into [LINK=UNIT_TREANT]Treant[/LINK]'s for a few turns
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Transforme toutes les forêts de votre empire en [LINK=UNIT_TREANT]Homarbres[/LINK] pour quelques tours
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Verwandelt alle Wälder in eurem Reich für einige Runden in [LINK=UNIT_TREANT]Baumhirten[/LINK]
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Transforms all the forests in your empire into [LINK=UNIT_TREANT]Treant[/LINK]'s for a few turns
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Transforms all the forests in your empire into [LINK=UNIT_TREANT]Treant[/LINK]'s for a few turns

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Can only be used once per turn[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Heals the unit by 15%
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Ne peut être utilisé qu'une fois par tour[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Soigne l'unité de 15%
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Kann nur einmal pro Runde benutzt werden[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Heilt 20% Schaden bei einer Einheit
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Can only be used once per turn[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Heals the unit by 15%
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Can only be used once per turn[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Heals the unit by 15%

TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Verwandelt das Geländefeld für eine gewisse Zeit in [LINK=TERRAIN_SNOW]Eis[\LINK]
[ICON_BULLET]Alle eure Einheiten erhalten die Beförderung [LINK=PROMOTION_HIDDEN_NATIONALITY]Verborgene Nationalität[\LINK]

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Toutes vos unités gagnent la promotion [LINK=PROMOTION_WARCRY]Cri de Guerre[\LINK]

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]%D1% chance to create a [LINK=UNIT_SLAVE]slave[\LINK] from combat
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]%D1% probabilité de créer un [LINK=UNIT_SLAVE]esclave[\LINK] à l'issue d'un combat
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]%D1% Chance nach dem Kampf einen [LINK=UNIT_SLAVE]Sklaven[\LINK] zu bekommen
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]%D1% chance to create a [LINK=UNIT_SLAVE]slave[\LINK] from combat
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]%D1% chance to create a [LINK=UNIT_SLAVE]slave[\LINK] from combat
